events.title: Education: Started Masters degree in Industry 4.0
events.description: Began a two-year program (2024-2026) at the Poznań University of Economics and Business.

events.title: Open Source: next-loading-box
events.description: Developed a lightweight React component for Next.js to handle route change loading states, improving UX during page transitions.

events.title: Education: Achieved Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Economics
events.description: Graduated from the University of Gdańsk.

events.title: Article: AMP in 2024 — A Forgotten Relic?
events.description: Explored the relevance of Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) in modern web development, particularly in the context of React and Next.js performance optimization.

events.title: Article: Navigating Through Memoization's Complexity Maze
events.description: Authored an in-depth guide on memoization in React, covering implementation strategies and addressing associated challenges to optimize application performance.

events.title: Open Source: next-lazy-hydration-on-scroll
events.description: Developed a solution for progressive hydration of prerendered components in Next.js.

events.title: Open Source: next-maintenance-mode
events.description: Contributed to the development of a Next.js package for implementing maintenance mode in applications.

events.title: Article: Protecting Next.js API: Evaluating Three Rate Limiting Approaches
events.description: Analyzed and compared different rate limiting strategies to protect Next.js APIs from overload and potential security threats.

events.title: Article: Implementing maintenance mode in Next.js apps
events.description: Wrote a comprehensive guide on integrating maintenance mode functionality in Next.js applications to manage planned downtimes.

events.title: Education: Total TypeScript (by Matt Pocock)
events.description: Completed an extensive TypeScript course, covering advanced concepts and best practices...

events.title: Article: Choosing a Data Fetching Library: A Look at React Query and SWR
events.description: Conducted an in-depth comparison of top data-fetching libraries for Next.js, focusing on React Query and SWR.

events.title: Education: Contentful Certified Professional
events.description: Achieved certification demonstrating expertise in using Contentful Platform.

events.title: Started working at Blazity
events.description: Joined Blazity as a React/Next.js Developer, contributing to cutting-edge web development projects and expanding professional experience.

events.title: Education: Started Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Economics
